SA20n1300:4: bodhisattvaḥ kāmayate vinetuṃ sattvānaparhatuṃ duḥkhānyacarati tasmāddhyānam |
SA20n1300:5: yogāvacaraḥ svacittaṃ saṃgṛhṇan sarvavikṣepaikhyavahito gacchantiṣṭhanniṣīdañchayāno vā smṛtimabhimukhīmupasthāpayati |
SA20n1300:6: paśyatyanulobhaṃ pratilobhaṃ kapālaṃ śīrṣa kaśerukāṃ bāhkurparamuraḥ parśakāṃ śroṇi kaṭaṃ jānvadharaṃ gunfau |
SA20n1300:10: caritvā pariśuddhaṃ samādhiṃ vītākuśalavitarkavicāraḥ sattveṣu pariṇāmyātmanā salābhinaḥ karotītyubhayalābhaḥ |
SA20n1300:19: yathā yathā dharmāñcaṇoti tathā tathasya cittṃ prītaṃ bhavati sukhitam |
SA20n1300:22: evamanusmmṛtya sarvadā dharmagaveṣaṇākāle'syottarottasmutsāhaḥ saṃpravardhate 'horātraṃ dharmaśravaṇe'syābhirucirbhavati na ca klāntirnāpyasyatuptiriti śrutamayī prajñā |
SA20n1300:26: anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmāno'śucayaḥ kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇamutpadyante nirudhyante'ciraṃ pamohāgninā jvalitāḥ saṃvarddhayanti paścimaṃ duḥkhamahāskandham |
SA20n1300:27: māyāvanmṛṣeva bhāgha it sarveṣu saṃskṛtadharmeṣu janayati saṃvegam |
SA20n1300:29: cinayati yattathāgatāprajñā'cintyā'parimeyā mahābalā'parājitā prāptā'pagatabhayasparśāṃ mahānagarī na ca punarāvartate duḥkhebhyo'prameyebhyaḥ sattvānaparitrāyate |
SA20n1300:30: evaṃ jānāti buddhasyāprameyāṃ praġyāṃ paśyati saṃskṛtadharmāṇāmaparimeyadu |
SA20n1300:35: kṣapayato vitarkavicāran prasannabhyantarastaikāgracittasyāvitarkavicāraḥ samādhirasyopajāyate saprīti śukhaṃ viśati dvitīyaṃ dhyānam |
SA20n1300:36: prīti parityajyopekṣāsaṃskāravān smṛtisaṃprajanyacittaḥ kāye śukhaṃ vedayakṣāryābhilāpepekṣārhāṃ nityamanusmaransukhāṃ vedanāṃ viśati tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam prajahāti duḥkhaṃ prajahāti śukhaṃ niruṇaddhi śokaṃ prīti viśatyaduḥkhamśukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśūddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam |
SA20n1300:38: niruṇaddhi sarvaṃ pratighalakṣaṇaṃ nānusmarati viṣabhāgalakṣaṇaṃ tena jānatyākāśamanantam |
SA20n1300:43: tena jānan nevasaṃjñānāsṃjñāsparśaṃ tataḥ praviśati naiva saṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam |
SA20n1300:44: sarvadharmānkevalamanusmarañcarati na ca rajyati gaveṣayatyanuttaraṃ mahāyānam |
SA20n1300:46: bodhisattvaḥ śrutena cintayā bhāvanayā ca saṃgṛhṇāti cittam |
SA20n1300:47: tataḥ pūrayati [ṣaḍ] abhijñā [stisro ] vidyāḥ samādhi dhyānapāramitām ||
SA20n1300:50: dhyāyannairātmyamavāpnoti tathāgatadhyānānīti prathamaḥ dhyānna ca sakto na ca rakto na ca bhavati kliṣṭacitto na ca gaveṣayatyātmasukhamiti dvitīyaḥ |
SA20n1300:52: dhyānprajānāti janakāyacittāni paritrāyate ca sarvasattvāniti caturthaḥ |
SA20n1300:53: dhyāyānnācarati mahākaruṇāṃ chinatti sattvānāṃ kleśagranthimiti paṃcamaḥ |
SA20n1300:56: dhyāyañcitaṃ śāntaṃbhavati nirvṛttaṃ yānadvayasyātikrāmyati sarvāṇi dhyānānītyaṣṭamaḥ |
SA20n1300:57: dhyāyannityaṃ viśati prajñāṃ lokamatikramyāvapnoti tatpadamiti navamaḥ |
SA20n1300:58: dhyāyanpratiṣṭhāpayati saddharmaṃ nirantaraṃ saṃvarddhayati triratnaṃ yena bhavatyanucchinnamiti daśamaḥ |
SA20n1300:60: 8 | jñātuṃ punaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kliṣṭacittāni saṃgṛhṇāti sarvadhyānasamādhidharmān cittasthairyaṃ vidhātuṃ |
SA20n1300:63: śūnyatā khalvalakṣaṇāpraṇihitākriyābhiḥ samā tena sattvā api samāḥ |
SA20n1300:65: yataḥ sattvāḥ samāstena dharmā api samāḥ |
SA20n1300:67: 9 | punarbodhisattvo lokamanucarannapi na ca bhavati lokasaktaḥ prajahātyaṣṭau lokadharmānvināśayati sarvagranthiṃ tyajati janāvāsaṃ rocate'sya viviktāyatanam |
SA20n1300:68: evaṃ dhyānamācarataścittaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati prajahāti saṃsārakarmāṇi ||
SA20n1300:69: 10 | punarbodhisattvasya dhyānamācarata ṛddhirbhavati prajñopāyo matiḥ kathaṃ bhavatyṛddhi kathaṃ prajñā |
SA20n1300:70: paśyati cedrūpalakṣaṇam śṛṇoti śabdaṃ jānāti paracittaṃ smaratyatītaṃ prāpnoti sarvabuddhalokadhātūntadasyārddhiḥ |
SA20n1300:71: rūpaṃ jānāti ced dharmasvabhāvaṃ jānāti śabdagaṃndharasaspraṣṭavyacittasaṃskārāḥ svabhāvālakṣaṇāḥ śāntāḥparinirvṛtāstriṣvadhvasu samā iti |
SA20n1300:74: dhyānasamādhimanuviśannutpādayati mahāmaitrīṃ karuṇāṃ na jahāti prāṇidhānaṃ vajramiva bhavati cāsya cittamavalokayanbuddhalokadhātu niṣpādayati bodhimārgamityupāyaḥ |
SA20n1300:76: na cātmāna ca pudgala iti cintayati sarvadharmānmūlasvabhāvāvikṣepān |
SA20n1300:77: paśyati buddhalokadhātumākāśalakṣaṇam yanniṣpannaṃ tatpaśyati śāntaṃ nirvāṇamiti matiḥ |
SA20n1300:78: iti bositvaścarandhyānamṛddhi prajñāmupāyaṃ mati ca vibhajya caturvastūnyācaratyavāptotyanuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim |
